duties_responsibilities.duty: Preparation of General Arrangement, Bill of materials, and submission to a customer as per project schedule.
Responsible to generate an active part and windings meeting factory limitation, guideline, and checklist as per IEEE standards.

Responsible for the development of various application transformers designs in coordination with the global Hitachi Energy factory based on the purchase order requirements, ordering specification in different areas of transformer Mechanical design.
Coordinating design activities within Engineering Department.
Participation in internal design concept reviews.
Develop working relationship with the factory worker to master design for manufacturing.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
